column1: "  Ciao! Sono here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have about your blood pressure and heart rate. As a medical professional, I would recommend that you consult with a doctor or an audiologist to address any hearing issues you may be experiencing. They will be able to perform a thorough examination and provide a proper diagnosis, as well as suggest appropriate treatment options. In the meantime, if you have any questions or concerns about your blood pressure or heart rate, please feel free to ask and I will do my best to assist you." "Mi dispiace
column2: ma non posso fornire consigli medici o risolvere problemi di udito. Ti consiglio di cercare un professionista nel campo dell'audiologia per un'adeguata valutazione e assistenza."
